name: Bloby's Journey
description:
Bloby's Journey is a short 2D platformer game made with Unity in which you play as a small orange alien blob. This my first published game ever. 

PLOT:

After a meteorite crashes on a distant planet, a small alien blob wakes up from the remnants and discovers a strange world full of indigenous creatures.

  • Run, jump and try to find the way out
  • Defend yourself from harm
  • Explore 10 different levels full of traps and aliens
  • Collect as many points as possible
  • Have fun!

xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

INSTRUCTIONS:

  • Left and Right Keys: Move
  • Up Key: Jump (Up x 2 for Double Jump)
  • Down Key: Crouch
  • Z: Punch
  • X: Shield
  • C: Float
  • Space: Shoot

CREDITS:

game by Alex Boaru
